item.description:
Please refer to http://www.hudsonvalleydockdogs.com/ with any specific questions! :)

Hudson Valley DockDogs states:

Hudson Valley DockDogs is excited to announce we will be hosting a DockDogs Regional Competition at the Bass Pro Shops in Foxboro, MA July 21-22, 2012!! Join us for 2 days of high flying DockDogs action! There will be Big Air, Speed Retrieve, and Extreme Vertical competitions. All dogs will be competing for a chance to win CASH prizes in the FINALS on Sunday (EV is Saturday). Anyone is welcome to enter, pre-registration is at www.dockdogs.com Pre-registration will close July 15 at11:45pm EST. Hurry, space is limited!! questions? email hudsonvalleydockdogs@gmail.com

Event Schedule

Saturday, July 21

· Onsite Registration / Practice - 8:00am

· Big Air WAVE # 1 - 9:00 am

· Speed Retrieve # 1 - 11:00 am

· Big Air WAVE # 2 - 1:00 pm

· Big Air WAVE # 3 - 3:00 pm

· Extreme Vertical - 5:30 pm

Sunday, July 22

· Onsite Registration / Practice - 8:00am

· Big Air WAVE # 4 - 9:00 am

· Big Air WAVE # 5 - 11:00 am

· Speed Retrieve # 2 - 1:00 pm

· Speed Retrieve Finals - 3:00pm

· Big Air Divisional Finals - 3:30pm (Top 6 in each division)
item.name: Hudson Valley DockDogs presents: Bass Pro Shops Backyard Splash!
